title: Good way to waste time
text: This is my go to game to play when I‚Äôm sitting bored , my only real complaints about this game is it‚Äôs unrealistic standard to progress,it takes forever to save up the money to play expensive games and your basically rigged to fail when you do get up there , I worked for weeks to get 1.2 million ‚Äúdollars‚Äù on this game , went to play a single million ‚Äúdollar‚Äù game and got paired with a level 150 ( I was level 26) and lost every dollar . Which leads me into my second issue , there is absolutely no ranking in this game , you can be paired with literally any and every level , I played a tournament and I was the only low level there (I‚Äôve never seen a person hit a 4 cusion pocket accurately until this tournament) . And I didn‚Äôt even make it past the quarterfinals due to playing with people wayyyyyyyy out of my skill level , I feel they need to implement some kind of ranking system so the matches are more fairly based and more entertaining

title: Deleting Reviews
text: I wrote a review years ago stating how the game pitted me against bots and drained me of coins but since it has been deleted I‚Äôll write another, more updated review. I‚Äôll center this one around the fact that the game has gotten significantly more boring and frustrating over time. The challenges aren‚Äôt as fun. The Pool Pass takes double the amount of time to complete and the rewards from the pool pass have become less enticing. Before you could win a couple Lucky Shots with some hefty rewards like 60 pool cash. Now, you have the chance of winning one. Given the shot is rigged and somehow your cue power does not function the same on these, it was nice to have the extra to adjust and MAYBE win something. They took that away. The app in general feels a bit more glitchy as well and not as smooth to operate. Ultimately Miniclip continues to become more and more money hungry catering more toward players with billions of coins and those willing to pay real money to play. Not fun for the average player anymore.
